meanings.definition: To transfer data from a local computer to a remote computer.
meanings.sent1: I am uploading my photos to the cloud.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys uploading videos to social media platforms.
meanings.sent3: Why did the computer go to therapy? It had too many issues with uploading!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like uploading joy into the room.
meanings.sent5: The process of uploading felt like sending a digital message to the world.

meanings.definition: The act of sending files or data from one device to another.
meanings.sent1: The uploading of documents was completed successfully.
meanings.sent2: He needed a faster internet connection for quicker uploading.
meanings.sent3: Why did the smartphone break up with the laptop? It couldn't handle the uploading pressure!
meanings.sent4: The uploading of information was like a digital relay race.
meanings.sent5: The uploading process was as smooth as a gentle stream flowing between devices.
